title: Thousand Tongues
lyrics:
I saw my guilt upon Your cross
I found new life from what was lost
I am free, how can it be? Yeah!
You broke the power of canceled sin
You brought this child back home again
I am free, how can it be?



Oh, for a thousand tongues to sing

My great Redeemer's praise

The glories of my God and King

The triumphs of Your grace



You crushed the darkness with Your love

You washed me white in crimson flood

I am free, how can it be? Oh

I am free, how can it be?



Oh, for a thousand tongues to sing

My great Redeemer's praise

The glories of my God and King

The triumphs of Your grace



You triumphed over my every mistake

Over the depths of my shame

Over the prison of fear

You have the victory here

Over the sting of the grave

You are faithful and mighty to save

Let all that's within me proclaim

Your power, Your greatness, Your name!



Oh, for a thousand tongues to sing

My great Redeemer's praise

The glories of my God and King

The triumphs of Your grace

Oh, for a thousand tongues to sing

My great Redeemer's praise

The glories of my God and King

The triumphs of Your grace!



Woah-oh-ooh

The triumphs of Your grace!

Woah-oh-ooooh
